item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The 20 year old PSP can now connect to WPA2 WiFi Networks (189 points | 59 comments)
2. A decade later, a decade lost (2024) (351 points | 98 comments)
3. The hardest working font in Manhattan (368 points | 50 comments)
4. Q2DOS – Quake 2 backported to MS-DOS (75 points | 44 comments)
5. Nping – ping, but with a graph or table view (25 points | 5 comments)
6. Did Semgrep Just Get a Lot More Interesting? (85 points | 26 comments)
7. If you ever stacked cups in gym class, blame my dad (206 points | 33 comments)
8. We were wrong about GPUs (495 points | 327 comments)
9. Complex dynamics require complex solutions (163 points | 98 comments)
10. The largest sofa you can move around a corner (137 points | 68 comments)
11. The Iconic 3DBenchy Enters the Public Domain (132 points | 8 comments)
12. TL;DW: Too Long; Didn't Watch Distill YouTube Videos to the Relevant Information (83 points | 60 comments)
13. Bookshop.org launches Kindle alternative, sends e-book sales to local bookstores (42 points | 5 comments)
14. TeX and Typst: Layout Models (2024) (193 points | 27 comments)
15. Are DOGE's Claims of Social Security Payments to 150-Year-Olds Way Off Base? (21 points | 12 comments)
16. Show HN: Letting LLMs Run a Debugger (10 points | 6 comments)
17. If you believe in "Artificial Intelligence", take five minutes to ask it (65 points | 77 comments)
18. A study on how turtles navigate using the Earth’s magnetic field (151 points | 56 comments)
19. Questioning the Criteria for Evaluating Non-Cryptographic Hash Functions (27 points | 5 comments)
20. Msxbook OneChipMSX MSX2 Computer (45 points | 14 comments)
21. Show HN: Transform your codebase into a single Markdown doc for feeding into AI (235 points | 150 comments)
22. Elements of Programming (2009) (119 points | 6 comments)
23. Recurring checklists using Org Mode in Emacs (15 points | 2 comments)
24. Airbnb CEO says it's still too early for AI trip planning (5 points | 1 comment)
25. Intensional Joy (a concatenative account of internal structure) (43 points | 8 comments)
26. Sunsetting Create React App (70 points | 57 comments)
27. Kevin Mitnik FOIA Final (167 points | 86 comments)
28. Wyden Releases Draft Bill to Secure Americans' Communications (105 points | 16 comments)
29. Detecting AI agent use and abuse (132 points | 74 comments)
30. Anyone can push updates to the doge.gov website (991 points | 885 comments)
